trans-unit.source: Sets the mode for authorization checks when using the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PrincipalPermissionAttribute"></xref> to control access to a method.
trans-unit.target: Imposta la modalità per i controlli di autorizzazione quando si utilizza il <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PrincipalPermissionAttribute"> </xref> per controllare l'accesso a un metodo.

trans-unit.source: Always enables the user to specify a <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> class for <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal*>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre consente all'utente di specificare una <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>classe per <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal*>.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal*> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>

trans-unit.source: Enables the user to specify a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> class for <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal*>.
trans-unit.target: Consente all'utente di specificare una <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>classe per <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal*>.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal*> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> di personalizzata

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal*> is set based on the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] role provider (<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal*>è impostata in base il [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] provider di ruoli (<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>).</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider></xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal*>

trans-unit.source: If the user identity is not associated with a Windows account, anonymous Windows is used.
trans-unit.target: Se l'identità dell'utente non è associata a un account di Windows, viene utilizzato Windows anonimo.
